AvoidCatchingNPE.description:
Description

Deprecated

Code should never throw NullPointerExceptions under normal circumstances.  A catch block may hide the
original error, causing other, more subtle problems later on.

Deprecated:This rule is deprecated since PMD 7.18.0 and will be removed with PMD 8.0.0.
This rule has been subsumed byAvoidCatchingGenericException,
which is now configurable as to which exceptions cause a violation.

Example(s):

Use this rule by referencing it:
AvoidCatchingNPE.option: This rule has no specific options.
